dt: {bc}having the title and usually the honors belonging to an office or dignity without the duties, functions, or responsibilities

dt.t: the {wi}titular{/wi} head of a political party

dt: {bc}bearing a title derived from a defunct ecclesiastical jurisdiction (such as an episcopal see)
{bc}of, relating to, or constituting a title

shortdef: having the title and usually the honors belonging to an office or dignity without the duties, functions, or responsibilities
existing in title only; especially : bearing a title derived from a defunct ecclesiastical jurisdiction (such as an episcopal see)
of, relating to, or constituting a title
